price: 19. (Alle) Wuu Og yahay khiyaanada isha loo dabo iyo waxay laabuhu qarsadaanba.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنِ وَمَا تُخۡفِي ٱلصُّدُورُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu khāinata al-aʿyuni wamā tukh'fī al-ṣudūru
